title: Ranked Flex match making issues [Update]
body:
Hey all,

We are aware of the issues with match quality and odd placements in Ranked Flex. We have put a short term fix in place that should fix some but not all players MMRs. Unfortunately, to fix all players' MMRs and correct the issue that's causing players to be seeded incorrectly, we will require some downtime.

We are working through the best way to roll this fix out and you can expect additional details in the coming week. Thank you for your continued patience!

---
15/11/2016

A lot of you had to play one placement match today. This was due to a fix going out this morning.

Network Operations â€“ 8:14 AM
We have rolled out a potential fix for the matchmaking issues in Ranked. If you have already placed into a League, you will need to play one additional placement game to determine your new ranking

You can now find a more detailed explanation [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/XMZm8OPI-ranked-corrections-to-placement-results-and-ranks).

---

3:45pm 15/11/2016

Latest update here - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/XMZm8OPI-ranked-corrections-to-placement-results-and-ranks

replies.body: I've been seeing a few under lvl 30s in Flex queue as well, is this intended or will there be a fix for that as well?
that definitely shouldnt be possible. If you see it again send through some screen shots to player support thanks!

Hi maruadaur, 

Could you please explain what determines the mmr. 
Like specifically?

cheers
I can't go into it specifically really. But vaguely it depends on wins/losses and also how good your opponents were.

I dont understand how my plat account has been allocated bronze.
I was unaware that there was going to be this quick fix match and I had a bugsplat at the start of the game right after achieving 1st blood.  
Being put down 5 tiers though. I mean fair enough i didnt mind being in silver as I was still playing with plats but now.....
Also will this affect my solo/duo ranking?
Thanks in advance
I'm with this guy. Was placed Gold IV, climbed to promo series, lost the game that was meant to 'fix' my MMR and it dropped me down to Silver II.
Yes something is a miss. On promo for bronze 1. I'm vs plat and diamond. Really confused.

I've already climbed 2 divisions from silver 4, was 99lp in my placements to silver 1, win a game, back down to silver 4 again. 

I was gold 5 last season and was consistently being placed against plats/diamonds in the games I played. I feel like I earned that climb and it really makes me feel like I wasted a lot of time. I want to know if you're going to compensate players in some way for this?
I was climbing as well. Just got out of game to be knocked back down another 2 divisions...Really frustrating, what a waste of time.

ok well Im a plat and my account in flex went from silver 3 to bronze from the "quick fix".
All my games were vs diamond and plat so makes no sense to me.
Seems you ended season 6 in G4 not plat?

True I didn't play last season and there is elo decay. Still though my point is I'm in bronze playing against diamond and plat. I don't mind it as the games are of quality but does this mean I'll be vs master when I get to silver?
In the most general sense you will vs whatever is appropriate for your mmr, and with enough games your rank will shift to match your mmr and visa versa.

Yeah, I think it was an easy fix but definitely wasn't the right one. It doesn't make sense, they screwed over a bunch of players, then in an attempt to fix it, they screwed over everyone who had actually managed to do well. 

I just wanted to smash it to gold before solo/duo was released just to get it out of the way. I was so close, too. Fml.
Yeah, I'm probably not going to play anymore until there is more updates. This whole scenario could even happen again. Think I'll just wait and see.

Latest update here:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/XMZm8OPI-ranked-corrections-to-placement-results-and-ranks

Yeah well, the original 10 placement games placed me lower than i was all S6 (I was around Silver 3 or 4) and i got put bronze 1 which i was like hmm ok not the best but I can live with it, its not too much different. However just when I'm about to get into silver promos again i get pushed back to bronze 3. Thanks, what a waste of time its been.

Hi @Marauder, 

I got placed in silver 3 for flex.
I won all my game to a promo series for silver 2. 
I lost the first match due to a dc and then after the game i was replaced in bronze 2.
Surely this is not how it works. 
Also someone else in that game inthe chat lobby was like "WOAH i just went up 4 tiers"

Can you please fix my account the games are now terrrible. 
Plus lsoing 5 tiers is a lot of games to play when I was almost in gold.
True, we need a explain.

Marauder my favourite rioter (: 

Flex ranked games have been quite interesting. In fact I wasn't even mad when the lv 20 adc ahri was on my team. Or yesterday where the enemy mid laner was LGC chuchuz and my jungle was bronze 5. I found it nice asking in all chat what is LGC carbon like in real life. Apparently he is the same as in front of the camera. 

https://i.gyazo.com/ad244ce61f295b9f0abbff18f7b30506.jpg 

I think my favourite part was chuchuz getting solo'd by silver brand.

> [{quoted}](name=Stratter2,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=u2iR6nTU,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-11-14T01:22:34.951+0000)
>
>

Perma ban :3 {{summoner:11}} {{summoner:14}}

lol its funny because im someone who is about to move to australia (from canada) and a few days ago there was a thread on reddit about how ppl who say "go kill yourselves" should be punished and someone said something like "guess 90% of OCE playerbase is gone". xD hopefully you guys aren't that toxic i look forward to starting fresh on a new region

> [{quoted}](name=ThaSUPREME,realm=NA,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=u2iR6nTU,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2016-11-14T06:01:35.323+0000)
>
> lol its funny because im someone who is about to move to australia (from canada) and a few days ago there was a thread on reddit about how ppl who say "go kill yourselves" should be punished and someone said something like "guess 90% of OCE playerbase is gone". xD hopefully you guys aren't that toxic i look forward to starting fresh on a new region

Man, you are going from one of the kindest places to one of the Rudest. Like, we flame with the best of them and stuff will get weird when someone calls you a houso or a bogan or something and you have no idea what you have been called
oh man.. you dunno what you're in for do you.. xD
ey, Nice to meet another fellow canadian

Hi, 

I went 10-0 for flex placements was matched with Diamonds, Plats for some games and Plat, Golds for some Silver, Bronze for some ect 
However I got placed at Bronze V 0 LP I am slightly confused this must be a bug right? A challenger 5s 3s player on another server apparently went 10-0 for placements and got placed at Bronze V 0 LP as well. 

I wasn't looking to be placed at like Diamond after 10-0 but hey Bronze V 0 LP.... xd
played against plats/diamonds, went 8-2 in placements. Lost to a team full of challengers and diamonds. Placed in silver 3. thanks.
exact same thing happened to me doesn't make sense.
I'll hold off playing Flex with my friends until the full fix is in place then.
Cheers Maraudaur, always there for the community when needed <3

Always where? 

oh he says "oops something went wrong" ... but no actual fixes, and here are people like you with racially offensive names White Knighting a riot staff who has no actual fix or solution or planned solution.

Its damn random. Season 5 I was Silver 5. I go 5/5 and get Bronze 3, a friend who was Silver 4 last season goes 4/6 and gets placed Gold 3?

Systems fucked bro.

How's my name in any way 'racially offensive'. I'm not being racist in any way at all, it's simply a word that sounds like another.. You're not the only one who gets bad placements, it depends on your MMR from the previos season. I was Silver 3, went 8-2 and got Bronze 1, don't see me complaining, just realise you have something to work on and do it, I'm gold 5 now.

Seriously ?
i had good placement games and got placed in Gold 3.
Now Rito tell us to play one more game, mkay
got placed in Bronze 1...
WOW
got 8 tiers down in a single game, didnt think it was remotly possible.

Nice fix Rito !

This just made things so much worse...

I was starting to climb and it just dropped me to Silver II (I've been Platinum for the last two seasons).
You should be in heaven then.. Smashing silvers like a porn star.
Like

Haha I'm in the same boat but the 11th placement game changed from silver to bronze. Last night I won the series for bronze 1 against a diamond apponent..... not quite sure it's working
I'm looking forward to solo q

This potential fix isn't a fix at all. I was placed in Silver IV after my 10 placements and played 34 games after. Managed to climb and everything, too. I won most of my promos. Then I do my rematch and I get slapped in to Bronze V. Please tell me you're going to be rolling out more effective fixes? Because this just seems absurd. It also seems that I'm not the only one being dropped like this. What in the heck is going on??

Yes I ended the season in b2, but i played my flex series realy well, and i had in my team and the enemy team people from bronz to diamond division, won 7/10. I won against people that are higher division than I am and thought that i can't get under silver but you placed me to b3. And I was mad but i played anyway. Then you made us play one more game to be ranked again, you said that you 'fixed' flex, but you jus made it worse, i won that one game and got into b5. Why did i even bother to try playing good, i could have gone afk or trolled all 10 games and again got into b5, I just don't get this ranking sistem.

"Fix"? I placed Gold 4 after 6win 4loss, and now I played the new placement match "fix" and I get bronze 3. that's brutal! I just spent last season climbing out of bronze finally make it out and now im placed back in bronze after you originally placed me gold 4, CAN I please have my original placement back?

Thanks for the update and the fix!
Although, as a proud scrub my self. As much as it sucked, it was interesting seeing how Diamonds and Master play.

So I finished my placements 2 days ago and got bronze 1, I then got to silver 5 over that day. 
I just finished the stupid additional placement and got placed bronze 3. I know I can climb back to where I was but what is riot going to do to compensate people who just fucked people over? I know people who spent more time and effort to accomplish their goals and it went down the drain.
It comes down to the fact that the original placements were unfair all around, and so needed to be fixed. From S5 0lp, a B3 placement is not unreasonable.
It's fine riot games. But just fix this issue for the love of god my girlfriend is calling me a silver scrub she might even leave me!!!! {{summoner:4}}
I think you'll most likely have your rank bumped up to something in Gold after you play that one placement.
so i was in my promos for s4 when this came out, I needed 1 win for s4. I won it and got a message saying I got placed in s5. Ty

Div 5 0 lp usually indicates a lower mmr than the rank reflects (as the mmr has yet to adjust to your new rank since you haven't played any games there), and because you have to drop a lot of mmr before getting demoted, you can have mmr that indicates a rank significantly lower if you are sitting in a div 5 on 0lp.

Long story short, this means that being placed in S5 is not unreasonable from G5 if your mmr was low for your rank.

It sucks that you got dropped, but the original placements for flex were dodgy as all hell all around hence the need for a fix.
i kept getting put with gold plat players and even once a diamond then i played a game today and i went from bronze 3 to bronze V like wtf i think this reroll was bugged out

I was silver IV and then i played my flex match and went down to bronze 1 
i was tanky went positive with lots of assist and kills and we won 
ive won 9/3 games with generally good scores 
i dont understand why i was dropped down
